title: Salah Springs Defeat for Man City
description:
The FC crew recap Liverpool's surprise win over Man City thanks to a late Mo Salah goal on a quick counter attack. Plus, the panel dissect Barcelona's performance and Xavi's tactics in their 3-1 loss to Real Madrid in El Clasico, and Arsenal narrowly defeat Leeds to expand their Premier League lead.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Mo Salah's goal beings a surprise defeat to Man City; Barcelona's underwhelming El Clasico loss; Arsenal lucky to beat Leeds?
